sentences.en: "Giles phoned this morning," Mirella said with feigned indifference.
sentences.cn: “贾尔斯今早来电话了，”米雷拉装作若无其事地说。

sentences.en: Hamlet feigned himself unable to recognize Polonius.
sentences.cn: 哈姆雷特假装自己不认得普娄尼亚斯.

sentences.en: Hamlet feigned that he couldn't recognize Polonius.
sentences.cn: 哈姆雷特装出不认得普娄尼亚斯的样子.

sentences.en: He accepted the invitation with feigned enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 他假装热情地接受了邀请.

sentences.en: He feigned an excuse for his absence.
sentences.cn: 他为自己的缺席编了个借口.

sentences.en: He feigned death to escape capture.
He feigned indifference to criticism of his work.
sentences.cn: 他假装毫不在意别人批评他的作品.

sentences.en: He greeted Marion with his voice pitched carefully to avoid either feigned enthusiasm or dislike.
sentences.cn: 他用既不伪装热情,又不表示嫌恶的谨慎语调问候马丽恩.

sentences.en: He was consuming with indignation, real or feigned.
sentences.cn: 他大发雷霆, 不知是真的还是假的.

sentences.en: Sally spun round, a feigned look of surprise on her face.
sentences.cn: 萨莉急转过身来，脸上装出一副吃惊的表情。

sentences.en: She feigned surprise and they believed her.
sentences.cn: 她假装吃惊,他们相信了她.

sentences.en: She feigned that she was mad.
She said good - bye with feigned indifference.
The farmer feigned that he was dead when he happened to meet a big bear.
sentences.cn: 农夫碰见大熊时,他假装自己已死了.

sentences.en: Wu Sun - fu looked swiftly up and roared with what looked like feigned surprise, " What!
sentences.cn: 吴荪甫立刻抬起眼来,故意吃惊似的喊道: “ 什么!

trans.tran_cn: 假装，伪装( feign的过去式和过去分词 )，捏造（借口、理由等）
